short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set of tools to improve web development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WD__tools is a set of tools designed to improve front-end web development. 

The tools included are:
路 Text filling tool for all elements, by tags or selectively.
路 Button to set the amount of text to add.
路 Tool to superimpose an image that subdivides the page into twelve parts for checking the bootstrap grid.
路 Tool to search for elements that leave the page.
